name: Rouge Tomate's Velvet Sunrise
description: This spirit-free cocktail from Rouge Tomate in NYC is a citrusy beta-carotene booster.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce orange juice, from about 1 orange
2 ounces carrot juice, from about 1 medium, peeled carrot (fine strained to remove pulp)
2 ounces of clementine juice, from about 2 clementines
1/2 ounce pomegranate juice, from about 1/2 cup pomegranate seeds
Garnish: 1 small bunch of sage leaves

recipeInstructions.text: For the ginger-agave syrup: In a resealable jar, stir ginger juice into agave nectar until loosened. Cover and shake well. Store for up to 1 week, shake before using.
For the yuzu-agave syrup: In a resealable jar, stir yuzu juice into agave nectar until loosened. Cover and shake well. Store for up to 1 week, shake before using.

For the cocktail: In a cocktail shaker, muddle the sage. Add clementine juice, orange juice, carrot juice, and squeeze of lemon juice (optional). Fill with ice, shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled highball glass.
Pour pomegranate juice on top for sunrise effect. Garnish with fresh sage leaves and serve.
